value: This is a free app made for assisting people to celebrate our greatest festivals.
We would like to thank these people for making this app possible with:
Mantra and Sahit by Nar Bahadur Lamichhane
Gift Icon by 'Pixel Buddha' from http://flaticon.com
Om and Guitar Icon by 'Roundicons' from http://flaticon.com
The OFFERS shown in the app are provided by the user by using our form. So please make sure that the offer is valid by visiting the official site linked with the offer.
